name: Super Dragon Ball Z
overview: Super Dragon Ball Z (超 スーパードラゴンボールZ) is a cel-shaded 3D fighting video game, based on the Japanese manga series Dragon Ball created by Akira Toriyama. Shifting away from the gameplay of recent series such as the Dragon Ball Z / Budokai and Sparking! / Budokai Tenkaichi games, Super Dragon Ball Z brings its style back to a more traditional formula made famous with the Capcom & SNK. games of the 1990s.
